body.description: SheaMoisture's African Black Soap Eczema bar soap is a homeopathic bar soap that delivers a gentle cleansing experience to help soothe mild symptoms of Eczema and itching. This SheaMoisture sulfate free bath soap is made with fair trade Shea Butter; use cleanser as a bath and body skin care every day. Made with homeopathic ingredients, our moisturizing bar soap and sensitive skin bar soap are known to help temporarily relieve the mild symptoms of eczema and mild itching. Soothe and calm troubled skin with this homeopathic beauty bar, body bar soap, gentle skin cleanser that relieves mild symptoms of eczema and mild itching. Use our homeopathic bar soap by lathering the soap in hands or on a washcloth, massaging this body soap all over. Rinse thoroughly. Gentle enough for the face and for daily use. All body soap and skin care claims are based on traditional homeopathic practice, not accepted medical advice. Not US FDA evaluated. Our Story: SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker, a pioneering mother of four and an entrepreneur, who sold Shea Butter, African Black Soap and homemade beauty preparations in Sierra Leone in 1912. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa. With every purchase you show support of our mission to reinvest back in our communities.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Made with homeopathic ingredients, SheaMoisture’s moisturizing bar soap and sensitive skin bar soap are known to help relieve the mild symptoms of eczema and mild itching

The Calming Skin Must Have Made with Shea Butter and nutrient rich homeopathic ingredients, it soothes troubled skin. Together, We Give Back With every purchase, you support our mission to reinvest back in our communities. Tried, True and Cruelty Free Tested on friends and family for generations, never on animals. Because of Her SheaMoisture is the legacy of Sofi Tucker. We honor her vision by continuing to formulate with Raw Shea Butter handcrafted by women in Africa.

AFRICAN BLACK SOAP CLARIFYING FACIAL WIPES AFRICAN BLACK SOAP PROBLEM SKIN TONER AFRICAN BLACK SOAP SOOTHING BODY LOTION Naturally infused towelettes that remove makeup, dirt, and impurities without rinsing or drying out skin. A dual action astringent that removes impurities caused by bacteria and other factors that create an imbalance on the skin's surface. Made with African Black Soap and organic Shea Butter, a soothing lotion that helps calm and hydrate dry skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Im not a fan of residue left by soap and I found this one doesn’t leave that film on your skin. Also helped with my really dry skin! Also love that it’s a bar and has minimal waste! This bar probably last me three months! No harsh smell either, which I don’t like. Soft and gentle is the best to describe this soap!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nice I would definitely buy this again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I will never use another soap again.
reviews.reviewText: Picture 1 is my skin a few months ago. You can see some of the oiliness on my nose and cheeks, a breakout on my chin, and overall just not a great skin tone. I don’t ever use foundation or anything on my skin, so I thought this was just the skin I had to live with! Then last week, picture #2 happens all over my WHOLE BODY so I was desperately seeking some relief!I ordered this soap and have now been using it for one week, and I feel like my skin is entirely different! Picture #3 was taken at 11 pm after I just worked, I hadn’t even washed or wiped my face, yet I had no oily buildup! It even had my partner questioning if I had started wearing a foundation.I finally pressured my partner to try the boar soap, and as soon as he came out of the shower he was hollering for me. His skin, beard, and body hair are so incredibly soft that we have both sworn to keep using this soap forever. I don’t know what the magic ingredients are, but I cannot recommend it enough!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Extremely Good for dry skin
reviews.reviewText: Love this soap. I could feel a difference the first time I used it.Looking for moisturizer made by this company.I highly recommend this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beware: not for seborrheic dermatitis
reviews.reviewText: I love the scent and lather of the soap, but it is definitely not good for seborrheic dermatitis. I’d purchased a plain black soap by Ambi from the local hair store and loved the effects on my face when I incorporated it into my routine. Ambi has been trusted by my family for generations so I’m never concerned about trying their products, this one just didn’t work for me as a face soap. I think it might be the perfume used in this soap that irritates my skin, but immediately after using it I had a flare up. I tried it a couple more times to be sure, and it definitely is the soap causing the reaction. I will keep it as a body bar because I absolutely love the scent, but I’ll have to keep looking for a face soap unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non toxic and moisturizing
reviews.reviewText: We love this soap I. My house. It lasts long, non toxic ingredients, smells good but not over pouring and moisturizing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So I tried black soap today and didn't enjoy it because of the strong, unpleasant aroma and the soap's scratchy particles. Aside from that, it appears to be like olive oil soap. However, this soap is actually black, which is interesting.
Always very fast deliveryJust love this productKeeps my skin clear and clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 31, 2018
reviews.reviewText: Fantastic smell. Foams so well. Lasts ages.
Great soap but it leaves my skin feeling extremely dry.

I have been using this black soap for a month now, I refrained to give any review until I had used it for a while, but honestly this soap didn't work on me, maybe I had put too much expectations in it or the results take long but till now nothing changed on my skin.
